title: Warhorse

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player to Startle. Startled players will become Violent if they are investigated or if they visit another Startled player. Startled is a status condition which lasts until they die. Evil and neutral players cannot be Startled. Startled players are informed they are.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- One random player who visits you becomes Startled each night.
- Violent is a status condition which cannot be removed no matter what. Players are informed they're Violent.
- Violent players appear suspicious.
- When two Violent players visit each other, one will randomly deal a basic attack to the other.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: See one player die at the hands of a Violent player.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4477
*The warhorse slowly glanced at his loose shelf filled with dusty medals and neatly folded up clothes from his previous tours. In a split-second, he whipped around and shot the source of a startling noise, unloading his battered revolver into the creaky window. The glass shattered into a thousand fragments. Freezing wind tore through the room, bringing down the shelf in a thundering crash and scattering the dust off the golden medallions as they hit the floor.*
